EmailTemplate.description: Use this tempate for web to lead auto response
EmailTemplate.name: Web-To-Lead Auto Response Mail
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for inquiring with Frosty Boy Australia
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Name},
Thank you for your enquire regarding Frosty Boy Australia {!Lead.Interested_in__c}. We are committed to provide you with an excellent experience. You should expect a response to your enquire within 48 hours. In the meantime, please feel free to contact us by telephone +61 7 3806 2888. Frosty Boy Australia is a “Pure Happiness” provider.
Kind regards, Frosty Boy Team info@frostyboy.com.au
www.frostyboy.com.au | www.frozenyoghurt.com.au | www.frostyboyequipment.com.au
